title: PBE download literally less than 10% of my normal download speed
body: So I've had a pbe account since around season 4 or so? (I think?) and I uninstalled it, but was wanting to reinstall it. However, I am getting 300 kbps MAX when my normal download speed is 12-16 mbps. I've tested other downloads, and it is only slower when downloading the pbe, and drastically slower. Anyone else having problems/know a fix or even a cause like maybe severs are under stress or something? Just wanting to know at least WHY it's so slow

replies.body: This is happening mostly due to how many people are currently downloading the client most likely. The page itself has taken a hit from how many players were trying to access it at the same time, and the download servers are likely having the same issues.
You're not the only one having issues. I've been stuck at 31% for an hour.
